content.text: (FB 582) Resolved an issue where linked edges where not being deleted with items. Edge Validator cleans up invalid asset edges.
(FB 574) Updated asset view to show most recent ACAS import. RMK now tracks vulnerability dates and assets dates separately.

(FB 596) RMK did not update network adapters with data from ACAS because assets could not be verified with the current data. RMK now acknowledges Asset information in spite of not matching 3 areas of identification.
(FB 594) Resolved an issue where the Asset Details View didn't scale properly. RMK now scales the Asset Details View appropriately for large displays.
(FB 590) RMK classified NullPointer Exceptions as  Severe. RMK now classifies them as Fine Level messages.
(FB 585) Resolved issue where the IAVM to Asset report showed an incorrect SecurityCenter source.  Data integrity was confirmed.
(FB 604) Resolved an issue where tool tips had pastel colors. RMK Updated the Enclave Asset Details View with different colors and added Tool Tips to the Enclave Asset Details View.
(FB 595) Resolved issue where the Hierarchy Tree did not indicate the last level in a branch. RMK now hides the expand/collapse icon once the last level is reached.
(FB 571) Resolved an issue where RMK had generic identifiers. RMK now provides specific ACAS API identifiers to identify the asset.
(FB 637) Resolved an issue the Asset page was not correctly plotting the score in the Risk matrix.
(FB 629) Resolved issue where Last Seen Date was not updating in Last Seen Tab. Now RMK produces a Last Seen Date that corresponds to the Managed Asset End Time.
(FB 606) Added ability to filter using grouping.
(FB 621) Removed device failures from SCP and SV reference pages.
(FB 612) Added ability to group by the operating system in the enclave assets detail page.
(FB 581) Create AcasInvalidAsset class for assets that do not meet the minimum requirement of being an asset.
(FB 615) Made HBSS the authoritative source for the applying hostname to an asset.
(FB 611) Kept the asset sort numbers on the Enclave Asset Details Page.
(FB 579) Created a Severe Alert tag to develop an audit trail for important events.
(FB 610) Added labels to distinguish between DITPR or COAMS.
(FB 608) Added the Severity Category to Top Findings Tool Tip.
(FB 555) Added ability to export Vulnerability Breakdown Report to CSV.
(FB 602) Added ability to sort hierarchy tree by System ID or System Name.
(FB 617) Added ability to sort the Findings Column on the Enclave Asset Details Page.
(FB 609) Created a Top Finding Legend. Removed the Top Finding Tool Tip.
(FB 607) Added quantity subtotals specific to the hierarchy selected in the Hierarchy Tree.
(FB 603) Added ability to search by DITPR IDs.
(FB 616) Removed the Build a List feature from the Enclave Assets Details Page.
(FB 622) Changed the HBSS last seen date to the file name date on Assets page.
(FB 578) Requirement to create DBC views is no longer applicable.
